XIII.ii.2.D.1.d
.
Information to Furnish Examining Units of OPM Area Offices
Examining units of OPM area offices may be furnished the same confidential information from VA as the OPM itself.
Furnish civil service preference certificates that identify the confidential information concerning the disabilities involved to examining units upon request.
Note
:  If there is a medical officer available to make the necessary medical determinations required under the Veterans’ Preference Act of 1944, as amended, OPM has instructed examining units to adjudicate preference claims of Veteran-applicants in connection with examinations under unit jurisdiction, including the claims of
spouses, or
mothers of disabled ex-service members.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Information Sharing With the Office of Personnel Management (OPM)
